title: COVID-19 fighter Vandana Tiwari died due to brain haemorrhage in MP, not due to an attack by Muslims in UP
subtitle: The image shows Vandana Tiwari, a pharmacist in Madhya Pradesh, who had died due to brain haemorrhage. She was not attacked by Muslims in UP. At the time of the incident, Vandana was working against the spread of COVID-19 in MP.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image of a woman lying on a hospital bed is being shared with the claim that Dr. Vandana Tiwari has died in the attacks of Muslims in UP when she went to screen them for COVID-19. ‘FACTLY’ has found that Vandana Tiwari, a pharmacist in Madhya Pradesh who had been working against the spread of COVID-19 in the state, had died due to brain haemorrhage. So, the claim that she had died in the attacks of Muslims in UP when she went to screen them for COVID-19 is false.

Did you watch our new video?
